summary: This document is an email chain from January 2020 regarding the status of a subpoena for banking records from USAA for Ghislaine Maxwell. It shows coordination between an Assistant United States Attorney and others about receiving records related to the criminal investigation.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The banking records subpoena is for her, indicating she is under investigation for criminal banking matters.

events.title: USAA records request initiated
events.description: A request for banking records from USAA related to Ghislaine Maxwell was received and is being prepared.

events.title: Confirmation of records receipt
events.description: An email confirms that the requested USAA records for Ghislaine Maxwell have been received and a copy was dropped off to SONY.

locations: I St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY
keyFacts: A subpoena was issued to USAA for Ghislaine Maxwell's banking records as part of a criminal investigation.
The records request was processed through a service called ClaimFox, with a specific invoice and claim number.
An Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York was coordinating the receipt of these records.
A copy of the received records was dropped off at 'SONY' (likely a typo or reference to SDNY - Southern District of New York).
The communication highlights the ongoing financial investigation into Ghislaine Maxwell as of late 2019/early 2020.
